Text:
watched it all. was a good episode.. that hoffman is a drop though keeps breaking and messing up stuff lol


anyhow seemed all in sync to me.. one weather interference though on audio and minor jitter on first 5min only

and its better watch with VLC and turn on the real time sharpener and slide knob a little..

MPC is much more blurry

theres a HDTV mp4 out now if want sharper quality

but i wont be converting.. as this one done me
(since i watch on laptop mostly)
